how_they_work_together: 1. Core mechanic M## executes game logic in tick_engine or card_handler
2. ML companion M##a observes the same telemetry events via TelemetryEnvelopeV2
3. ML scores write back into IntelligenceState fields (alpha, risk, volatility...)
4. IntelligenceState modifies core mechanic behavior on next tick
5. touchMechanic(id, signal) fires for both core and ML IDs simultaneously
6. Until real models exist: heuristic_substitute holds the approximate value

intelligence_signal_map.alpha: Overall AI advantage — fed by economy ML (M06a, M09a, M32a)
intelligence_signal_map.risk: Risk score — fed by risk ML (M03a, M07a, M12a, M35a)
intelligence_signal_map.volatility: Market chaos — fed by market ML (M05a, M20a, M33a)
intelligence_signal_map.antiCheat: Integrity score — fed by anti-cheat ML (M01a, M46a–M50a)
intelligence_signal_map.personalization: Player model — fed by progression ML (M11a, M42a, M44a)
intelligence_signal_map.rewardFit: Season tuning — fed by season ML (M19a, M39a, M65a)
intelligence_signal_map.recommendationPower: Card quality — fed by cards ML (M04a, M08a, M22a)
intelligence_signal_map.churnRisk: Retention signal — fed by social ML (M24a, M38a)
intelligence_signal_map.momentum: Win streak energy — fed by pvp ML (M15a, M16a, M37a)

core_tasks.title: Run Seed + Deterministic Replay
core_tasks.purpose: Every run is generated from a seed so outcomes are reproducible (for replays, challenges, and anti-cheat). The seed drives deck shuffles, macro schedule, and social chaos windows. Sharing a run shares the seed + your decisions, not just the result.

core_tasks.title: 12‑Minute Run Clock + Turn Timer
core_tasks.purpose: Runs are short, tense, and losable fast. The clock is real-time: each turn has a decision timer; unused time converts into 'Inertia' that increases Missed Opportunity odds. When the run clock hits zero, any unresolved liabilities can wipe you.

core_tasks.title: Solvency Wipe Conditions
core_tasks.purpose: Define 'death' clearly: cash < 0 with owed amount, forced sale chain that can't clear debt service, or macro-decay pushing cash to zero at end-of-rotation. Wipes end the run and snapshot the clip-worthy cause.

core_tasks.title: Deck Reactor (Dynamic Draw Mixing)
core_tasks.purpose: A deterministic 'reactor' chooses which deck to draw from each turn based on macro.creditTightness, player state (leverage, shields), and recent pass streaks. This is the digital equivalent of your recommended deck mixing rules.

core_tasks.title: Macro State + Cash Decay Loop
core_tasks.purpose: Macro Shift sets inflation (1–5) and credit tightness. End-of-rotation applies cash decay to idle cash. The UI makes this visible as a looming 'erosion meter' so players feel time pressure.

core_tasks.title: Cashflow Tick Engine (Assets + IPA)
core_tasks.purpose: At defined cadence (per turn or per round), assets + IPA produce monthly cashflow. Digital adds an 'auto-ledger' that itemizes sources and shows how close you are to escaping the current tier.

core_tasks.title: Leverage Purchase Resolver (Buff Order)
core_tasks.purpose: Purchasing big deals executes strict resolution order: leverage blocks → downpay credits → debt service credits/penalties. The app prevents illegal buys and shows exactly why you can’t afford something.

core_tasks.title: Shield / Cancel System
core_tasks.purpose: Shields cancel the next FUBAR or SO (or forced sale). Digital adds 'shield windows' so friends can donate a shield in clutch moments, creating shareable saves.

core_tasks.title: Opportunity Window + Open‑Table Auction
core_tasks.purpose: Passing on certain opportunities opens a timed auction to the table (or your friend list). If someone buys your passed deal, you get a small 'regret kick' + the clip labels it as a missed bag moment.

core_tasks.title: Market Pulse Exit Engine
core_tasks.purpose: Market Pulse cards create liquidation windows (sell eligible asset, forced sale, cashout offers). Digital adds a one-tap 'exit simulation' so players can see best/worst exits fast under time pressure.

core_tasks.title: Missed Opportunity Streak & Inertia Tax
core_tasks.purpose: Repeated hesitation triggers Missed Opportunity cards automatically. Digital tracks a visible 'hesitation meter' and injects inertia penalties (cash loss, turn loss, open-table reveal).

core_tasks.title: FUBAR Escalation Ladder
core_tasks.purpose: Small doodads stack into crises. Conditional FUBARs read your portfolio to compute the right pain. The ladder guarantees a 'FUBAR killed me' moment if you ignore risk too long.

core_tasks.title: Systemic Friction Modules (SO)
core_tasks.purpose: SO isn’t random annoyance—it's a module system: loan denials, delays, fees, leverage blocks. Modules are season-rotated so the meta changes without rewriting decks.

core_tasks.title: Disadvantage Draft (Run Start)
core_tasks.purpose: Instead of a flat start, players draft 1 disadvantage (and optionally 1 privilege) that shapes the run. Digital keeps it non-preachy by framing disadvantages as constraints, not moral judgment.

core_tasks.title: Social Chaos Tokens (Friends as Co‑Authors)
core_tasks.purpose: Each run grants limited 'Chaos Tokens' to your invited friends: they can trigger boosts, dilemmas, or minor FUBARs during specific windows. This makes your best moments socially authored.

core_tasks.title: Live Table Trigger: 'Hot Seat Vote'
core_tasks.purpose: At key decisions, the table can force a 10‑second vote: buy vs pass, sell vs hold. You can override once per run (at a cost). Great for opportunity flips and regret moments.

core_tasks.title: Clutch Assist: Friend Bailouts
core_tasks.purpose: Friends can send one bailout per run (cash grant, shield, downpay credit) using earned tokens. Bailouts are logged and rendered as shareable 'saved by ___' moments.

core_tasks.title: Rival Sabotage: Controlled Griefing
core_tasks.purpose: Allow adversarial play without ruining fairness: a rival can spend tokens to increase your next deck’s 'friction' weighting, but only within bounded ranges and with full disclosure post-run.

core_tasks.title: Season System (Rule Modules + Rewards)
core_tasks.purpose: Seasons rotate rule modules (macro volatility, credit tightness baseline, deck weights, social token budgets). Rewards are cosmetic + meta-unlocks that don’t pay-to-win.

core_tasks.title: Macro Shock Scheduler (Live Economy)
core_tasks.purpose: A server-driven schedule injects macro shocks (rate hikes, liquidity crunch, boom cycles). Shocks are seeded per season so runs are comparable while still feeling alive.

core_tasks.title: Meta‑Progression: Unlockable Rule Modules
core_tasks.purpose: Winning or dying unlocks modules: new starting loadouts, new chaos token types, new deck mix presets. Meta progression is about options, not raw power.

core_tasks.title: Moment Forge: 3‑Moment Guarantee System
core_tasks.purpose: The engine tracks whether your run has produced: (1) FUBAR kill/scare, (2) opportunity flip, (3) missed bag. If not, it gently nudges probabilities (within the seed) to surface those beats before the run ends.

core_tasks.title: Auto‑Clip + Caption Packager
core_tasks.purpose: Every share moment generates a 10–20s replay: state before, decision, outcome, and a caption template. One-tap share to socials or to your friend table feed.

core_tasks.title: Challenge Links: Seed + Decision Ghosts
core_tasks.purpose: Players can share a challenge link that loads the same seed and shows a 'ghost' of their decision timeline. Friends can try to beat the outcome and post their own flips.

core_tasks.title: Personal Improvement Overlay (Optional Metrics)
core_tasks.purpose: Optional layer that measures decisions (speed, risk balance, pass streaks, diversification) and gives neutral feedback. No preaching—just dashboards and tiny experiments you can toggle on/off.

ml_tasks.title: Seed Integrity + Deterministic Replay Forensics
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Detect replay/seed tampering and impossible action sequences while keeping runs deterministic. Uses lightweight anomaly detection over action timelines + consistency checks against the deterministic simulator. Outputs a signed 'Replay Integrity Score' for challenges, leaderboards, and share links.

ml_tasks.title: Pressure-Aware Difficulty Shaping (Timer Stress Model)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Estimate decision stress in real time (timer, state risk, social noise) and shape draw pacing without breaking fairness. Model predicts 'stall likelihood' + 'panic misclick risk' to tune UX prompts and reactor nudges. Ensures the 12‑minute loop stays tense but not randomly cruel.

ml_tasks.title: Solvency Collapse Predictor (Run Death Forecaster)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Predict probability of wipe in the next N ticks and explain the top contributing factors (fees, debt service, macro squeeze). Feeds post-mortems and 'near-death' clutch windows. Used for tutorial hints ONLY if user opts in; otherwise used silently for balancing and analytics.

ml_tasks.title: Deck Reactor RL Policy (Dynamic Draw Mixing)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Learn a draw-mix policy that maximizes tension + 3-moment guarantee while preserving skill expression. Uses constrained reinforcement learning / contextual bandits with hard caps to avoid 'rigged' feel. Produces per-tick draw distribution adjustments bounded by the deterministic director rules.

ml_tasks.title: Macro Regime Classifier + Cash Decay Tuner
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Classify macro regime (easy/neutral/hard) from live economy + run context; tune cash decay and friction weights within season bounds. Prevents runaway inflation/deflation loops across a season. Supports server-driven shocks while keeping runs comparable.

ml_tasks.title: Cashflow Forecast + Portfolio Health Embeddings
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Forecast next K cashflow ticks and generate a portfolio embedding used across the game (matching, balancing, personalization). Model learns patterns across asset combos, macro regimes, and player style. Drives 'moment cards' like 'cashflow spike' and 'bleed warning' (optional).

ml_tasks.title: Affordability + Default Risk Scorer (Purchase Resolver Assist)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Score purchase outcomes: affordability now, probability of future forced-sale chain, and debt-service fragility. Used to power 'explain why' UI and to balance leverage blocks and downpay credit offers. Never blocks legal purchases; it explains and predicts consequences.

ml_tasks.title: Shield Timing Policy (Clutch Intervention Model)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Predict optimal timing for shields/cancels and friend clutch windows. Uses sequence models to detect imminent multi-step FUBAR cascades. Outputs 'best save window' timestamps for UI and social assist prompts.

ml_tasks.title: Opportunity Value Model + Regret Stamp Generator
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Estimate opportunity EV (expected value) under time pressure and generate the 'regret delta' when you pass and someone buys. Provides clean, shareable 'you left $X on the table' cards. Also supports matchmaking for table auctions by aligning deal types with friend styles.

ml_tasks.title: Exit Timing Model (Pulse Sell/Flip Optimizer)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Predict best exit window within pulse constraints: hold vs sell vs partial. Uses temporal models + counterfactual simulation (what-if) for explainable 'opportunity flip' clips. Can drive a practice mode where players learn timing patterns.

ml_tasks.title: Hesitation / Inertia Detector (Micro-Behavior DL)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Detect hesitation from interaction telemetry (hover loops, rapid open/close, timeout proximity) to drive inertia tax fairly. Ensures hesitation penalties are consistent and resistant to exploitation. Feeds the optional improvement overlay (decision speed) with clean metrics.

ml_tasks.title: FUBAR Cascade Risk Model (Crisis Graph)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Model crisis as a graph of interacting risks; predict cascade probability and likely chain path. Enables dramatic but legible failures: the player can see the dominoes. Supports balancing by identifying overpowered crisis combos.

ml_tasks.title: Friction Module Tuner (Constrained Bandits)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Select and parameterize friction modules per season and per run context using constrained bandits. Objective: maintain target wipe-rate, flip-rate, and regret-rate while respecting fairness bounds. Produces audit logs so tuning decisions are explainable to designers.

ml_tasks.title: Disadvantage Draft Personalizer (Style-Aware)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Offer disadvantage options that meaningfully reshape runs without hard-countering the player. Uses player-style embeddings + novelty scoring to avoid repeats and to encourage skill growth (non-preachy). Strictly optional: can run as pure random for competitive modes.

ml_tasks.title: Social Token Recommender (Co-Author Engine)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Recommend which chaos tokens friends should play and when, maximizing highlight potential and minimizing grief. Uses multi-agent modeling: friend intent + player state + moment deficit. Respects privacy: uses in-session signals, not contact data.

ml_tasks.title: Consensus vs Contrarian Predictor (Hot Seat Vote)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Predict table vote outcome and surface 'you’re about to get outvoted' tension cues. Detects coordinated trolling and throttles sabotage tokens automatically. Generates share cards: 'they voted SELL—I held—and it flipped.'

ml_tasks.title: Bailout Trigger Classifier (Clutch Assist Gate)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Detect when a bailout will create a legendary moment vs when it will trivialize the run. Outputs 'bailout worthiness' with a small set of explainable features. Used to gate prompts; the underlying bailout allowances remain rule-based.

ml_tasks.title: Griefing Detection + Adversarial Budgeting
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Detect toxic sabotage patterns (targeting, stacking, timing abuse) with graph + sequence models. Auto-adjust adversarial token budgets and cooldowns in real time. Protects the social table while keeping rivalry fun.

ml_tasks.title: Season Meta Balancer (Offline Simulation + RL)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Run large offline simulations to tune season rule modules before launch. Uses RL/IL to search parameter spaces that hit targets: retention, wipe-rate, share-rate, and fairness. Produces a 'season balance report' artifact for designers.

ml_tasks.title: Macro Shock Generator (Distribution + Constraints)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Generate macro shock schedules that feel real, varied, and season-themed while meeting mechanical targets. Uses generative models (diffusion/transformer) constrained by rules and balance metrics. Outputs shocks with 'narrative labels' for share cards and UX.

ml_tasks.title: Meta-Progression Personalization (Unlock Routing)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Recommend unlock paths that fit the player’s style and create new routes, not raw power. Uses bandits + embeddings to maximize novelty and long-term mastery signals. Safeguard: avoids manipulative dark patterns; no pay pressure modeling.

ml_tasks.title: Moment Forge Classifier (3-Moment Guarantee Controller)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Detect whether a run has already produced each required moment type; if not, compute bounded nudges. Models moment likelihood from state trajectories; nudges only within strict caps. Logs every nudge for auditability and competitive integrity.

ml_tasks.title: Highlight Detection (Auto-Clip DL)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Find clip-worthy segments using temporal convolution/transformer over event streams. Auto-writes captions using templated NLG + small language model (optional), never exposing private info. Exports share packages optimized for short-form platforms.

ml_tasks.title: Challenge Matchmaking (Seed + Ghost Similarity)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Match players to challenge seeds and ghosts that are 'just barely beatable' (flow state). Uses metric learning to score similarity between trajectories and player skill embeddings. Reduces churn by avoiding impossible or boring challenges.

ml_tasks.title: Improvement Overlay Models (Skill Signals + Experiments)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Compute measurable, non-preachy skill signals (decision latency, risk calibration, regret delta, diversification). Suggest tiny experiments (A/B self-coaching) if the player opts in; otherwise it's analytics-only. Uses causal inference to avoid bogus advice (controls for macro regime and run constra

ml_tasks.title: Co-op Contract Fairness + Partner-Risk Scorer
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Score proposed co-op contracts for fairness, expected value split, and partner default risk without blocking negotiation. Generate a compact ‘risk receipt’ so players understand why a contract is dangerous (or genius). Feeds optional prompts and balance analytics; contract resolution remains rules +

ml_tasks.title: Clause Outcome Forecaster (Triggers, Escapes, Penalties)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Predict which clauses will trigger under likely futures (margin-call, forced unwind) and estimate expected penalty cost. Recommend clause configurations that preserve skill expression while preventing unfun lockouts. Produces explainable ‘clause heatmap’ for share receipts: ‘Clause 2 fired → wipe ch

ml_tasks.title: Handshake Negotiation Coach (Timer-Window Optimizer)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Model the negotiation as a timed bargaining game; predict acceptance odds for offers/counters under the clock. Detect slow-play / spam counter patterns and auto-throttle to protect run pacing. Creates highlight-ready ‘deal sniped’ moments by recognizing razor-thin acceptance windows.

ml_tasks.title: Mutual Risk Pool Actuary (Payout Likelihood + Anti-Abuse)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Estimate payout likelihood for defined shocks and keep the risk pool clutch (not an infinite bailout). Detect collusion patterns (pool farming) and enforce caps/cooldowns automatically. Outputs pool health metrics to designers and a simple ‘pool saved us’ receipt for players.

ml_tasks.title: Default Cascade Predictor (Takeover vs Unwind Routing)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Predict whether partner default will cascade into multi-asset liquidation and propose the least-degenerate unwind path. Detect betrayal-like patterns (strategic nonpayment) and tighten safeguards without deleting drama. Generates cinematic ‘buyout flip’ vs ‘default wipe’ proof cards.

ml_tasks.title: Synergy Discovery Engine (Combo Mining + Balance Watch)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Mine emergent synergy sets from play data (asset combos that consistently outperform) for curation and nerf/watch lists. Recommend synergy hints in onboarding/paths without giving away optimal play in competitive modes. Flags ‘degenerate’ sets early using offline simulation and counterfactuals.

ml_tasks.title: Liquidity Ladder Planner (Rung Completion + Fragility Score)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Score portfolio liquidity ladder completeness and predict forced-sale fragility given current macro regime. Suggest rung-filling opportunities (bounded) to reduce ‘no liquid rung’ regret deaths. Outputs a ladder health badge usable in the optional overlay and post-mortems.

ml_tasks.title: Hedge Pair Validator (Correlation Drift + Shock Stress Test)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Estimate hedge effectiveness in current regime and detect correlation drift that makes ‘safe’ pairs fail. Run fast stress tests during macro shocks to keep hedges dramatic but legible. Produces explainable ‘hedge held / hedge broke’ receipts for clips.

ml_tasks.title: Mod Impact Estimator (Socket Choice + Counterfactual ROI)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Predict marginal value of asset mods (fee reducer vs exit accelerator) given portfolio + timer + macro. Counterfactual simulation generates ‘this mod changed everything’ highlight explanations. Helps balance mod rarity and prevent invisible pay-to-win feel (mods are in-run only).

ml_tasks.title: Portfolio Heat Controller (Overconcentration + Friction Escalation)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Calibrate how Heat converts into friction/cascade odds so it feels earned, not arbitrary. Detect ‘heat abuse’ (players gaming thresholds) and smooth incentives via monotonic constraints. Feeds designer dashboards: heat vs wipe-rate vs flip-rate across skill bands.

ml_tasks.title: Achievement Proof Verifier (Ledger-Backed Badge Integrity)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Verify badge eligibility from ledger event graphs; detect impossible sequences and replay edits. Cluster suspicious badge minting patterns and quarantine without breaking normal players. Outputs signed achievement proofs for share cards and the exchange.

ml_tasks.title: Bounty Failure Forecaster (Streak Collapse Predictor)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Predict probability of bounty failure in next N ticks and identify the most likely breaking condition. Used to balance bounties so they’re risky but not random; prompts are opt-in only. Generates ‘lost the bounty’ receipts with clear causality (no vague blame).

ml_tasks.title: Quest Router (Moment Quest Personalization + Novelty)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Route moment quests to players based on style/skill/novelty to maximize share yield without repetition. Avoids manipulation: optimizes fun + learning + social content, not spend. Keeps daily/weekly rotation healthy using constrained bandits.

ml_tasks.title: Trophy Economy Balancer (Inflation Control + Anti-Farm)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Model trophy inflow/outflow to prevent inflation and reward skillful clutch over grind time. Detect farming loops and adjust payouts/cooldowns in real time (fail-closed). Produces season-level economy reports and tuning levers for designers.

ml_tasks.title: Cosmetic Exchange Fraud Detector (Market Integrity)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Detect wash-trading, collusive crafting, and duping patterns in the cosmetic exchange. Graph anomaly detection across accounts, sessions, and item flows (privacy-safe). Supports reversible quarantines and ‘clean market’ trust metrics.

ml_tasks.title: Onboarding Skill Estimator (90-Second Boot Run Classifier)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Classify new player skill signals from the boot run: decision latency, risk appetite, regret tendency. Select the next best starter path and optional prompts to reduce early churn. Hard safeguard: never lowers core difficulty in competitive modes—only routes learning content.

ml_tasks.title: Prompt Minimalism Controller (When to Speak, When to Fade)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Learn when prompts help vs annoy; fade prompts as mastery is demonstrated. Detect ‘prompt dependency’ and auto-reduce frequency to preserve the harsh feel. Measures impact on retention without inflating success unfairly.

ml_tasks.title: What-If Tutor (Counterfactual Policy Explainer)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Generate counterfactual comparisons for practice mode: ‘sell now vs hold’ and quantify differences. Uses fast causal controls so advice isn’t bogus (conditions on macro + constraints). Exports split-screen clips with legible, minimal text overlays.

ml_tasks.title: Starter Path Matchmaker (Archetype Routing + Anti-Boredom)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Match players to starter paths (Cashflow/Flip/Hedge/Social/Chaos) that create early wins *and* early lessons. Maximize novelty across runs so onboarding doesn’t feel repetitive. Supports co-op table matching by aligning paths that create shared moments.

ml_tasks.title: Training Wheels Scheduler (Grace-Period Optimization)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Decide how long training wheels should last per player based on boot/run signals and churn risk. Auto-phase out on mastery indicators; allows early opt-out for hardcore players. Protects brand intensity while avoiding rage quits from pure confusion.

ml_tasks.title: Ledger Anomaly Detector (Event Stream Forensics)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Detect anomalies in append-only ledgers: missing events, impossible ordering, desync fingerprints. Works as real-time guardrail: quarantine, re-verify, or degrade to safe mode. Produces forensics bundles for disputes and internal investigations.

ml_tasks.title: Signature & Freshness Monitor (Client Action Integrity)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Model abnormal signature/freshness failures to distinguish bad networks from malicious clients. Adaptive throttling prevents grief while keeping runs playable under poor connectivity. Outputs trust scores used by validator and market participation gates.

ml_tasks.title: Replay Consistency Model (Deterministic Validator Assist)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Speed up server verification by prioritizing high-risk runs and summarizing mismatch causes. Classifies mismatch types: timing abuse, state tamper, token injection, desync drift. Generates human-readable ‘why it failed verification’ receipts.

ml_tasks.title: Exploit Response Policy (Auto-Containment Optimizer)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Choose the least-disruptive containment action (throttle, shadow token ban, verify, quarantine) given exploit class and confidence. Ensures the system never stalls: degrade gracefully, keep the run moving. Logs every response with policy versioning for audits and appeals.

ml_tasks.title: Proof Card Verifier (Receipt Hash Trust Layer)
ml_tasks.what_it_adds: Verify shared proof cards against ledger-backed run certificates (seed/tick/outcome hash). Detect edited clips or fake flexes and label them without public shaming. Supports viral integrity: ‘receipt culture’ that’s fast, fun, and trustworthy.

ml_tasks.title: Syndicate Coalition Scoring (Multi-Party Deal Stability)
Escrow Milestone Success Model (Gaming-Resistant Release)
Reliability & Collusion Monitor (Reputation Stake)
Restructure Acceptance Forecaster (Distress Term Triage)

Rebalancing Pulse Action Planner (Seconds-to-Save Routing)
Stress Test Selector (Risk/Reward Balancer + Anti-Farm)
Complexity Heat Calibrator (Combo Degeneracy Detector)
Liability Netting Advisor (Cascade Minimization Under Caps)
Badge Tier Threshold Calibrator (Bronze→Platinum Distribution Control)
Team Contribution Estimator (Anti-Tagalong Credit Attribution)
Sponsored Bounty Integrity Guard (Stake Escrow + Collusion Detection)
Leaderboard Trust & Re-Verify Scheduler (Proof-Weighted Rankings)
Variety Index Abuse Detector (Anti-Grind Curve Hardening)
Mentor Matchmaker + Quality Guard (Guided Co-op Onboarding)
